description: Detects usage of "PresentationHost" which is a utility that runs ".xbap" (Browser Applications) files. It can be abused to run malicious ".xbap" files any bypass AWL
name: Application Whitelisting Bypass via PresentationHost.exe
query: (((process.executable:*\\presentationhost.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"PresentationHost.exe") AND process.command_line:*.xbap*) AND (NOT (process.command_line:(*C\:\\Windows\\* OR *C\:\\Program\ Files*))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
